client.lobby

Class SelectServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent

            • client.lobby.SelectServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class SelectServer
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This creates a dialog to join a server.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • startSearch

        public void startSearch()
        This method sets a Timer, so we will scan every 6sec for new servers. Servers found are copied in vs_Servers and displayed then in the SelectList

      • stopSearch

        public final void stopSearch()
        Stops the timer, so it will not search for servers.
